## Introduction to the stableDiffusion4R API

stableDiffusion4R is an R interface to 'Stable Diffusion' APIs, and additional APIs, for AI-driven creative image transformations. This page guides you in using the stableDiffusion4R's API.

## Test


```{=html}
<script src="./script.js"></script>

<!-- Model selection button -->
<button id="modelSelectBtn">Select Model</button>

<!-- Popup (modal) for model selection -->
<div id="modelSelectModal" class="modal">
  <!-- Modal content -->
  <div class="modal-content">
    <span class="close">&times;</span>
    <h2>Please select a model</h2>
    <!-- Add list or buttons for model selection here -->
    <select id="modelOptions">
      <option value="model1">Model 1</option>
      <option value="model2">Model 2</option>
      <!-- Existing models -->
      <option value="gpt-3.5">GPT-3.5</option>
      <option value="gpt-4">GPT-4</option>
      <option value="phind">Phind</option>
      <!-- New models -->
    </select>
    <button id="applyModel">Apply</button>
  </div>
</div>

<div id="app">
  <input type="text" id="userInput" placeholder="Enter text here" />
  <button id="submitButton" onclick="submitForm()">Submit</button>
  <div id="result">Results will be displayed here.</div>
</div>
```
